 {*} Contact Commentary

** The most vital thing that we do as a LoCo is keep our local community connected with the larger Ubuntu Community. The promotion and advertising of major Ubuntu events via our mailing list, forum, and website ensures that people know what is going on, locally and in Ubuntu at large. It amazes me how many forum 'views' we achieve.
